title: inconsistent tensor sizes when invoking backward()
body_html:
when i call backward function by using

batch_loss.backward()
i got following error, can anyone tell me why, thank you very much .

    batch_loss.backward()
  File "/home/wen/anaconda3/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 146, in backward
    self._execution_engine.run_backward((self,), (gradient,), retain_variables)
  File "/home/wen/anaconda3/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/autograd/_functions/tensor.py", line 546, in backward
    return grad_input.scatter_(self.dim, index, grad_output), None
RuntimeError: inconsistent tensor sizes at /py/conda-bld/pytorch_1493676237139/work/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c:466

body:
when i call backward function by using 

``
batch_loss.backward()
``
i got following error, can anyone tell me why, thank you very much .

```
    batch_loss.backward()
  File "/home/wen/anaconda3/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/autograd/variable.py", line 146, in backward
    self._execution_engine.run_backward((self,), (gradient,), retain_variables)
  File "/home/wen/anaconda3/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/autograd/_functions/tensor.py", line 546, in backward
    return grad_input.scatter_(self.dim, index, grad_output), None
RuntimeError: inconsistent tensor sizes at /py/conda-bld/pytorch_1493676237139/work/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorMath.c:466
```
